items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Red Dress for Great Price
items.body: This dress was super cute and I absolutely loved it. I wore it for halloween dressed as the fairy godmother from Shrek. I loved the sleeves of the dress. They’re thin, but they cover your arms and just add an extra beautiful touch. Also, the glitter on the dress didn’t shed as much as I thought it would, which is a plus! The fabric was comfortable, but the dress does come with a built in underwire bra area and it adds extra security. The dress was stretchy, and is tall girl approved. I’m 5’8” and this dress wasn’t too short on me. I thought it was the perfect length. The quality you get for the price is really good, and the red color is really pretty. 10/10 recommend. Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like it came from an expensive boutique! BEAUTIFUL I purchased for two different girls.
items.body: I purchased two sizes in this one for my daughter and one for her friend for two different dances. THEY WERE A HIT!. I was a little worried because air vac sealed and the package was SO small. Once I opened it it was ready to wear right out of the package. It is true to size, well made and hangs beautifully. It really looks like we purchased it at an expensive boutique Read more
items.author: coreybeth

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for Bigger Chests
items.body: Very cute, decent quality but definitely not made for bigger chested people! Stretches well and seems very comfortable. There's a giant underwire in the top and it is clearly not big enough for quite a good number of people. Read more
items.author: Lily Ivey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color does not match description
items.body: The dress is beautiful, but it is more of a brite red, instead of the wine color it appears to be. Its also longer than I first thought it would be! Very good considering this is my daughters homecoming dress. Read more
items.author: Barbie Hovermale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Wore this for my bday and it fit perfectly super cute and it does sparkle Read more
items.author: Keri

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good purchase for bustier types
items.body: The sparkles on the dress are stickers, and it honestly is mesh on top of cheaper fabric. The main issue is the bust area. The person for whom it was purchased is well endowed, and as such, would have to wear a wireless bra with this dress. We knew we would have to tape the dress to her, and she was okay with this until we tried the dress on. The wire of her bra showed through the dress due to the flimsier material, and there was a built in wire for the bra area. The wire area was so rigid though. It was worse than an underwire bra. It just wasn't going to work for us, so I ended up asking for a refund on this dress. Read more
items.author: osugirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Homecoming
items.body: The Women’s Sheer Long Sleeve Sequin Dress fit absolutely amazing! It hugged all the right places without being too tight, and the length was just right—not too short, which was perfect for a homecoming dance. The sheer sleeves and sequins gave it an elegant yet fun vibe, and I received so many compliments throughout the night. It’s comfortable to wear and easy to move in, making it a great choice for dancing the night away. Highly recommend this dress for anyone looking for a stylish and flattering option for special occasions! Read more
items.author: Toya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: I was skeptical when I bought it, but it is very flattering on. The fabric has ruching so it hides some insecurities and it’s stretchy! The back ties so it keep the sleeves up well. Great for a night out! Read more
items.author: Sarah P.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Navy, Dg, Purple, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
